item.title: Modder injects AI dialogue into 2002’s Animal Crossing using memory hack
item.description: Unofficial mod lets classic Nintendo GameCube title use AI chatbots with amusing results.

item.title: Microsoft open-sources Bill Gates’ 6502 BASIC from 1978
item.description: Historic interpreter taught millions to program on Commodore and Apple computers.

item.title: AOL announces September shutdown for dial-up Internet after 34 years
item.description: Around 175,000 households still use dial-up Internet in the US.
